meanings: (심하다) awful, terrible, dreadful, severe (illness), foul (smell/taste); (몹시 충격적이다) outrageous

vlive.korean: 지독한 다섯 남자. -잘 했어요? Amazing five guys. - Did you do well? 듣기 View video Show! Music core : [삭제필요][REPLAY] 10/29 쇼! 음악중심 '5분 딜레이~' Show! Music core
vlive.english: Amazing five guys. - Did you do well?

vlive.korean: 다가올 개학, 지독한 추위, 뚝 떨어진 입맛! Starting school, the blistering cold, no appetite for food! 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [FULL] NU`EST W X SUITS KNIGHTS - 뉴이스트W의 정장방!
vlive.english: Starting school, the blistering cold, no appetite for food!

vlive.korean: [벌써 표정부터 지독한 중2병이다...] 렌이에요 렌. [His expression shows the extend of his malady] It's Ren, Ren. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [NU’EST W] 응?? ASMR?? 아 뭔뜻인지 모르면 패스하자 (NU’EST W’s attendance and ASMR)
vlive.english: [His expression shows the extend of his malady] It's Ren, Ren.

vlive.korean: 저의 두 번째 에세이 '지독한 하루'를 가지고 이야기해보려고 합니다. while I was working as a Emergency Medic, called "A Dreadful Day." 듣기 View video V BOOKS : 글 쓰는 의사, 남궁인에게 책이란?
vlive.english: while I was working as a Emergency Medic, called "A Dreadful Day."

vlive.korean: [영수증을 향한 지독한 올가미] 아까 커피 주문하고 영수증 가져갔죠? [Persistent pursuit of the receipt] You didn't take your receipt, right? 듣기 View video GOT7 : 갓세븐의 하드캐리 10화 (GOT7 'HARD CARRY' ep.10)
vlive.english: [Persistent pursuit of the receipt] You didn't take your receipt, right?

examples.korean: living in dire poverty 발음듣기 지독한 가난 속에서 살아가는 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
There’s an awful smell in here. 발음듣기 이 안에서 지독한 냄새가 나. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: There’s an awful smell in here. 발음

examples.korean: I’m in a terrible predicament. 발음듣기 나는 지독한 궁지에 빠져 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I’m in a terrible predicament. 발음

examples.korean: We had a horrific trip. 발음듣기 우리는 지독한 여행을 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We had a horrific trip. 발음

examples.korean: The man’s a deuced fool! 발음듣기 그 남잔 지독한 바보야! Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The man’s a deuced fool! 발음
